trends: There have been no other sightings in Santa Rita
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my friend were out on the street and we heard a big loud vooom like a jet.we were singing and all of a sudden we saw a black bird fly by then all of a sudden a huge big black circle(there was light poles around us) then we ran inside cuz we had to tell are mom.and then went outside agan and the same thind happend to us but we were in our driveway and saw it again then then went inside again then went back to see if it would happen again but notthing happend.it looked liike a huge dark spot around us but it came so quick we couldnt look up to see it it felt like all the lights were off and we thought we were asleep and we didn't rember eneything after.
